headline: Ameriprise Financial (AMP): Evaluating Valuation After Adding Harpland and $160M in Client Assets
summary: Ameriprise Financial, Inc. welcomed Harpland Financial Management to its branch channel, gaining over $160 million in client assets. This move highlights Ameriprise’s continued appeal to independent advisory practices seeking advanced tools and stronger support. See our latest analysis for Ameriprise Financial. Following this addition to its advisor network, Ameriprise Financial’s recent momentum remains mixed. While the share price has seen some volatility, down 14.4% year-to-date, its...
